full_summary:
## Forklift Procurement Announcement

### Notice of Proposed Procurement

This procurement notice announces the proposed requirement for the provision of four forklifts and ancillary equipment by Fisheries and Oceans Canada, Canadian Coast Guard. The solicitation number is 30003288.

### Background and Objective

The Department of Oceans and Fisheries requires four forklifts to be delivered to various locations in British Columbia. The main objective of the contract is to procure the forklifts and have them delivered by March 31st, 2023.

### Scope of Work

The scope of work consists of two items:

* Item 001: Three forklifts and ancillary equipment to be delivered to specified locations in British Columbia
* Item 002: One forklift and ancillary equipment to be configured for cold weather operation and delivered to a specified location in British Columbia

### Security and Period of Contract

There are no security requirements associated with this procurement. The period of contract is from the date of award to the estimated delivery date.

### Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and other relevant trade agreements.

### Contact Information

Inquiries regarding this procurement must be submitted to Carina Della Valle, Contracting Authority, at Carina.DellaValle@dfo-mpo.gc.ca. 

### Trading Languages and Documents

Documents may be submitted in either official language, English or French.

### Response to this RFP

Bidders who are interested in this procurement opportunity shall submit their response to the address below

```
 Fisheries and Oceans Canada
 Contract Authority, Carina Della Valle
 200 Kent St, Station 13E228
 Ottawa
 Ontario
 K1A 0E6
 Canada
Carina.DellaValle@dfo-mpo.gc.ca
```
